Package com.YagizHakkiAydin

Class Street

java.lang.Object
com.YagizHakkiAydin.Street
Direct Known Subclasses:
StreetArray, StreetArrayList, StreetLDLinkedList, StreetLinkedList
public abstract class Street extends Object
Abstract class for different street types This class has abstract functions and normal functions
